speaker:

text:
Why
              ,
               
              how
               
              now
              ,
               
              Hecate
              ?
               
              You
               
              look
               
              angerly
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
Have
               
              I
               
              not
               
              reason
              ,
               
              beldams
               
              as
               
              you
               
              are
              ?

speaker: HECATE
text:
Saucy
               
              and
               
              overbold
              ,
               
              how
               
              did
               
              you
               
              dare

speaker: HECATE
text:
To
               
              trade
               
              and
               
              traffic
               
              with
               
              Macbeth

speaker: HECATE
text:
In
               
              riddles
               
              and
               
              affairs
               
              of
               
              death
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
And
               
              I
              ,
               
              the
               
              mistress
               
              of
               
              your
               
              charms
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
The
               
              close
               
              contriver
               
              of
               
              all
               
              harms
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
Was
               
              never
               
              called
               
              to
               
              bear
               
              my
               
              part

speaker: HECATE
text:
Or
               
              show
               
              the
               
              glory
               
              of
               
              our
               
              art
              ?

speaker: HECATE
text:
And
               
              which
               
              is
               
              worse
              ,
               
              all
               
              you
               
              have
               
              done

speaker: HECATE
text:
Hath
               
              been
               
              but
               
              for
               
              a
               
              wayward
               
              son
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
Spiteful
               
              and
               
              wrathful
              ,
               
              who
              ,
               
              as
               
              others
               
              do
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
Loves
               
              for
               
              his
               
              own
               
              ends
              ,
               
              not
               
              for
               
              you
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
But
               
              make
               
              amends
               
              now
              .
               
              Get
               
              you
               
              gone
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
And
               
              at
               
              the
               
              pit
               
              of
               
              Acheron

speaker: HECATE
text:
Meet
               
              me
               
              i’
               
              th’
               
              morning
              .
               
              Thither
               
              he

speaker: HECATE
text:
Will
               
              come
               
              to
               
              know
               
              his
               
              destiny
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
Your
               
              vessels
               
              and
               
              your
               
              spells
               
              provide
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
Your
               
              charms
               
              and
               
              everything
               
              beside
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
I
               
              am
               
              for
               
              th’
               
              air
              .
               
              This
               
              night
               
              I’ll
               
              spend

speaker: HECATE
text:
Unto
               
              a
               
              dismal
               
              and
               
              a
               
              fatal
               
              end
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
Great
               
              business
               
              must
               
              be
               
              wrought
               
              ere
               
              noon
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
Upon
               
              the
               
              corner
               
              of
               
              the
               
              moon

speaker: HECATE
text:
There
               
              hangs
               
              a
               
              vap’rous
               
              drop
               
              profound
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
I’ll
               
              catch
               
              it
               
              ere
               
              it
               
              come
               
              to
               
              ground
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
And
               
              that
              ,
               
              distilled
               
              by
               
              magic

              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
Shall
               
              raise
               
              such

speaker: HECATE
text:
As
               
              by
               
              the
               
              strength
               
              of
               
              their
               
              illusion

speaker: HECATE
text:
Shall
               
              draw
               
              him
               
              on
               
              to
               
              his
               
              confusion
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
He
               
              shall
               
              spurn
               
              fate
              ,
               
              scorn
               
              death
              ,
               
              and

speaker: HECATE
text:
His

              wisdom
              ,
               
              grace
              ,
               
              and

              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
And
               
              you
               
              all
               
              know
              ,
               
              security

speaker: HECATE
text:
Is
               
              mortals’
               
              chiefest
               
              enemy
              .

speaker: HECATE
text:
Hark
              !
               
              I
               
              am
               
              called
              .
               
              My
               
              little
               
              spirit
              ,
               
              see
              ,

speaker: HECATE
text:
Sits
               
              in
               
              a

              .

speaker:

text:
Come
